name: Operation Warcade VR
description: Relive the experience of playing the classic war arcade in a totally amazing way, thanks to virtual reality and the innovative immersion system that will make it possible for you to travel inside the video game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2300 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: HTC-Vive or OCULUS with Oculus touch required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2300 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: HTC-Vive or OCULUS with Oculus touch required
